H2: Extract audio from your videos online
TITLE: Extract audio from your videos online
META: Easiest way to Extract audio from your video in no time
LABEL: DOCX to PDF

TEXTUAL_CONTENT.content: Our video editing process elegant and straightforward
The results are accurate and hence completely satisfy user needs
You can use this application from now on any operating system, like Windows/Mac/Linux/Android/iPhone.
There is no server involved and hence your video is safe
Video editing is really fast and you can get your job done in no time
The application works completely on your browser without invlolving any server.Hence your data is safe

HOW_TO_CONTENT.heading: How to crop your mp4
steps: Wait patiently till the video gets loaded
Choose your crop aspect ratio or manually create your crop ratio
Click save to download your video

FAQ.question: What audio qualities are available?
FAQ.answer: Extract Audio provides you multiple options of different audio qualities in which you can download your extracted audio. The available audio qualities are 48k. 64k, 80k, 96k, 128k, 256k, and 320k

FAQ.question: What can i do if i am not sure what format to choose?
FAQ.answer: If you are not sure, what file format and audio quality to choose, you don't need to worry. Extract Audio has a default option which will extract the audio in the format best suited for your file type.

FAQ.question: Can I upload and extract audio from video file of any type?
FAQ.answer: Yes, extract audio allows you to extract audio from any video file format you want.  It supports MP4, MOV, FLV, AVI, MKV and other video files type.

FAQ.question: Why is is taking so long to process my file?
FAQ.answer: The time taken to extract the audio and process your video depend on the size of you file, the file format you have chosen and the audio quality you have selected. If your file size is bigger, it will take a bit longer than regular files.

FAQ.question: Which Windows versions does Extract Audio support?
FAQ.answer: Extract Audio is completely web-based and therefore provides cross-platform support. This means that our tool supports all versions of Windows. It not only works on Windows operating system but can work on any other operating system, that supports a browser.

FAQ.question: Does it support both Android and iOS platforms?
FAQ.answer: Yes, our website works on browser, and therefore supports both iOS and Android platforms

FAQ.question: I refreshed the browser by mistake. What do I do?
FAQ.answer: Since our website does not use any servers and does not store your data, the file that you have uploaded, will not be saved. You need to reupload the file to split it.

FAQ.question: How can I extract audio from multiple videos?
FAQ.answer: With extract audio, you can extract audio from your video files, one after the other. When you extract the audio from one file and click on extract, the video will be processed. After the video has been processed, you can see the download option on the screen. By clicking on it you can download the file. In order to extract audio from another video, you only need to refresh the browser and you will see the upload video option. Now you can again select your file which you want to extract audio.

FAQ.question: Will I be charged to use the website?
FAQ.answer: Our website is absolutely free and you can use it as many times as you want. There are no free trial uses, after which you will have to pay for using our services. We won't charge you anything.

FAQ.question: Will I have to create an account to use Extract Audio?
FAQ.answer: Our website does not require you to sign up or create an account. The platform is absolutely free and you can compress as many files as you want.

FAQ.question: Will my uploaded files be saved on the server?
FAQ.answer: Our website works on a cloud server and does not save your files. Your files will be completely safe with you after you have extracted audio from your file.
